p: Protein content of the untreated head bone and the 0‐min enzyme treatment were not significantly different, but they were both significantly larger than the 5‐min or 30‐min treatments, which were not significantly different. Protein content of Pollock, Cod, and Salmon head bone was reported as 70, 75, and 47 percent, respectively (after conversion to 4% moisture; Bechtel, 2003).
